topic.title: How to Show Only Changebars with an Accepted Changes View of the Document

body.p:
Begin by setting the parameters:
show.changes.and.comments
yes
show.changes.and.comments.as.pdf.sticky.notes no
This will make all changes visible in your document, with a footnote for each of the changes, the inserted and deleted text is styled.
